price: បន្ទាប់មក យើងនឹងសង្គ្រោះបណ្ដាអ្នកដែលបានកោតខ្លាច យើង ហើយយើងទុកឱ្យពួកដែលបំពានលុតជង្គង់ក្នុងវា(នរក)។
arabic: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّي ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْ وَّنَذَرُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيّٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: thumma nunajjī alladhīna ittaqaw wanadharu al-ẓālimīna fīhā jithiyyan
